reference.title: cxxapi-domain module
reference.shortdesc: Provides the description of the elements that refer to the API items within C++ API topics or other DITA topic types, such as concept or task.

section.title: Description
section.p: The cxxapi-domain is a module that packages several elements, such as <cxxclass> or <cxxstruct> elements. These elements allow the writer a consistent way to provide references to other topic types.
